about_the_game:
Have you ever thought about how life changes as we age? What will you be like in your old age? Aging and illness are inevitable parts of life and death, as well as a necessary component of a complete life. In this game, you play as a manager in a town inhabited solely by the elderly. Here, you'll connect emotionally with grandparents, share in their daily lives, and appreciate the diversity of human experience.

----------- Rich Resident Ecosystem ---------------

Over a hundred residents across seven areas, each with their own social and entertainment preferences, who can fall ill or pass away. Each is a unique, vivid individual, representing ordinary yet distinctive seniors we see around us.

------------- Relaxed and Casual Gameplay ---------------

Responsible for town development to meet the various needs of the elderly, hiring caregivers for those in declining health, and arranging medical plans for those nearing life's end.

------------- Educational and Fun Elements ------------

The team incorporates educational elements related to elder care, offering interesting tidbits about elderly living.

------------ Exquisite Hand-Drawn Art Style ----------------

Carefully stylized characters and scenes, predominantly in warm tones, create a beautiful and cozy town for seniors.
